loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La señora Sonia es una mujer de 50 años, tiene 2 hijos, uno de 21 años y el otro de 18, los cuales la apoyan diariamente en los gastos que tiene la familia. La señora Sonia vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad calurosa, popular por sus maravillosas líneas impresas en el suelo (hechas de piedra) en forma de animales y aún no se ha identificado el creador de las mismas. 

La señora Sonia identificó una gran oportunidad de negocio que le permitiría tener los ingresos necesarios para su pequeña familia, y fue así como decidió invertir todo sus ahorros en la compra de un vehículo para que su hijo pueda trabajar en el mismo, de esta manera es como su hijo ayuda a pagar los gastos de la casa, gana un promedio de S/.30 diarios.

Gracias a la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva ella podrá tramitar el brevete que es necesario para su hijo y  también para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo. Su sueño es poder tener una casa propia y también tener otro vehículo para que así puedan ganar el dinero que les es necesario.
texts.en:
Sonia is a 50 year old woman.  She has two children, ages 21 and 18.  They support her daily with the family expenses.  Sonia lives in the city of Nazca.  The city is warm, and it is popular for its marvelous lines imprinted on the ground (made from stone) in the shape of animals.  The creator of these shapes is still unknown.

Sonia found a great business opportunity that would allow her to have the needed income for her small family.  That is how she decided to invest all of her savings in the purchase of a vehicle for her son to work with.  This way her son helps to pay the household expenses.  He earns an average of 30 soles a day.

Thanks to the help from the Kiva lenders she will be able to pay for her son's driver’s license.  She will also provide maintenance on the vehicle.

Her dream is to be able to have her own house.  She also dreams of having another vehicle to be able to earn the money that they need.

loans.use: to pay for her son's driver's license and to provide maintenance on her vehicle.

loans.name: Alimatu

texts.en:
Alimatu is 30 years-old and married with two children, aged seven years and 15 years-old. She runs a general merchandise store in Goderich in a western area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. Both of her children are currently attending school. She has three additional dependents that live with her at home.

She's been in this business for seven years and sells Maggie, rice, cooking oil, sugar, tomatoes, macaroni, baked beans and palm oil at her store.  She also earns income from her husband, who works as a police man, a government civil servant. She says that her business is doing well and they are living an average life.

Alimatu requested this loan through Kiva partner BRAC Sierra Leone in order to purchase more palm oil, eggs, luncheon meat, tinned tomatoes and bags of rice. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her profit and improve her children’s welfare. In the future, she would like to open another outlet in a different area. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, eggs, luncheon meat, and bags of rice.

loans.name: Youssou

texts.fr: Monsieur Youssou  est un homme marié qui vit au Sénégal  depuis plusieurs années. Il est père de 5 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 3 et 14 ans.  Il est  agent de sécurité  dans un  poste de santé de la localité ou il vit.  En meme temps il pratique la vente d’habits  et de rafraîchissement  au portail de son lieu de travail.  Il a choisi cette activité  de commerce parce qu’il le trouve rentable d’autant plus qu’il a besoin de plus de revenus pour une prise en charge totale des besoins de sa famille. Il est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis novembre 2011. Il sollicite un crédit  de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de caisses de boissons et de sachets d’eau destinés a la vente. Son  objectif est de développer d’avantage son commerce et accroitre ses bénéfices.
texts.en: Mr. Youssou is a married man who has been living in Senegal for many years. He is the father of five children ranging from three to 14 years of age. Here is a security guard in a healthcare facility in his town. At the same time, he sells clothing and refreshments at the entrance of his work place. He has chosen this business activity because he finds it profitable, given that he needs additional revenues in order to be able to provide for his family’s needs. He has been a member of a branch of U-IMCEC since November 2011. He is seeking a loan of 100,000 West African francs in order by cases of beverages and plastic bags with water for sale. His goal is to grow his business further and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy beverages as well as plastic bags with water for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy sweet orange and bananas.

loans.name: Donald

texts.en:
This is 32 -year-old Donald from Krootown, a central area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. He is married with one child, age nine years-old. His wife assists him in the store. Their only child is currently attending school. 

Donald runs a clothing store in Krootown, where he sells clothes for men and women. He has been running this business for 13 years. He works at his store from Monday until Saturday, six days per week and eight hours a day from 8:50 am – 5:30 pm. He has a passion for business, and his business is the only source of income he has. He says that the main challenge to his business is low inventory turnover.

Donald has requested a loan in order to buy more clothing for men and women. The extra income from this loan will allow him to expand his business and increase his income, which will make it possible for him to take care of his family. In the future, he plans to open an industry in Sierra Leone. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing for men and women.

loans.name: Arrete

texts.fr: Madame Arrête  est âgée de 45 ans. Elle habite dans une des localités communautaires du Sénégal. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 6 et 30 ans. Elle gère depuis plus de 10 ans un restaurant dans le quartier ou elle habite. Auparavant elle vendait seulement du petit déjeuner. Mais actuellement elle a élargi son activité aux  3 repas  journaliers. Elle a choisi le secteur de la restauration par passion mais aussi a cause de son aspect lucratif. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis  aout 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de poulets et  de viande en grande quantité, de sacs de couscous, d’huile pour les besoins de la préparation du diner qu’il commercialise. Son objectif est de renforcer son activité, d’accroitre ses bénéfices  pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Arrête is 45 years old.  She lives in Senegal.  She is married and is the mother of 5 children, ages 6 to 30.  For more than ten years she has been the manager of a restaurant in her neighborhood.  Initially she only sold breakfast but has expanded her business and now serves three meals per day.  She chose to work in the restaurant business because this is her passion, but also because this activity allows her to make some money.  She has been a member of a local branch of UIMCEC since August 2011.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 CFA francs, which will allow her to buy large quantities of chickens, meat, couscous bags and oil for the preparation of meals.  Her goal is to boost her business, increase her profits and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy some chickens, oil, meat and couscous in order to prepare and sell meals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials such as: tile, cement and ceiling panels, and to pay for labor to put in a new floor.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
This is 32-year-old Emmanuel from Aberdeen, a western area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. He is married with two children aged three and seven years-old.   One of his children is currently attending school. He started his business because he was let go from the Sierra Leone Port Authority as a security guard.   

Emmanuel runs a Timber store at Aberdeen where he sells timber. He has been running this business for four years, and works at the business from Monday until Saturday, six days per week and ten hours a day. He also earns income from farming. He says that the main challenge to his business is transportation. At one time, he encountered much difficulty finding proper transportation to take the timber from the interior village into town.

Emmanuel has requested a loan in order to purchase more power- saw machines and more timber. The extra income from this loan will allow him to improve his standard of living. In the future, he plans to be a timber distributor. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase more power-saw machines and timber.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the expenses related to her child's school promotion.

loans.name: Mohamed C

texts.en:
This is 36-year-old Mohamed from Waterloo in the Eastern area of Freetown, Sierra Leone. He is married with 2 children aged of 2 and 7 years. His older child is currently attending school, and he also has 5 additional dependents living with him at home. 

Mohamed runs a general merchandise store in Waterloo, where he sells cement, bags of rice, sugar and fillets. He has been running this business for 5 years. He works at the business from 8 am until 6 pm 6 days per week. He also earns income from renting out a house. He says that the main challenges to his business are transportation and slow sales in the rainy season.

Mohamed has requested a loan in order to buy more general merchandise such as cement, bags of rice, and sugar. The extra income from this loan will allow him to educate his child and increase his savings. In the future, he plans to build more houses and purchase a car. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: To purchase more cement, bags of rice, and sugar.

loans.name: David Jesus

texts.es:
David es un joven soltero de 19 años , se desempeña como DJ presta servicios de animación musical y canciones seleccionadas. David es un joven responsable, honesto y muy trabajador con muchas ganas de salir adelante, empezó en el negocio hace 2 años y gana un promedio de S/. 290,00 soles semanales, el joven tiene el deseo de progresar y superarse para que en un futuro llegue a ser un profesional . Con el crédito que le otorgará Kiva de S/. 2500 soles , lo invertirá en la compra de equipos musicales.

Uno de sus sueños es formar su propia empresa de animación musical y artes musicales para que llegue  a ser un empresario exitoso, su asesor cree que es un buen  cliente y que podrá pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.
David vive y trabaja en Ica, Perú. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peruvian's traditional national drink, Pisco. In this hot, arid climate we find the client's home and business.
texts.en:
David is 19 years old and is single. He works as a DJ, providing a musical entertainment and song-selection service. David is a responsible, honest and very hardworking young man who really wants to get ahead in life. He started working in this field two years ago and earns an average of 290 PEN per week. He wants to progress and better himself so that he can become a professional in the future. He will invest Kiva’s loan of 2500 PEN in the purchase of musical equipment.

One of his dreams is to set up his own musical entertainment and musical arts company and eventually become a successful businessman. His advisor considers him a good client and believes he will be able to pay the instalments on his loan punctually.

David lives and works in Ica, Peru. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert, about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and an 8.0 in 2007), its grapes, asparagus and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peru's traditional national drink, pisco. This region, with its hot, arid climate, is where David lives and runs his business.

loans.use: to buy musical equipment.

loans.name: Glenda Elizabeth

texts.es:
Glenda, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, ya que quiere surtir la tienda, comprara productos no perecederos como, azúcar, harinas, sopas instantáneas, café, entre otras, ella quiere mantener bien surtido el negocio para poder ofrecer a los clientes.
Ella comenta que ha tenido una buena experiencia en el manejo de los préstamos, ya que su efecto fue positivo logrando incrementar sus ventas y los ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Glenda is requesting a new loan so that she can restock her store. She will buy nonperishable products such as sugar, flour, instant soups, coffee, and other items. Glenda wants to maintain a well-stocked business so that she can offer products to her customers.

She says that she has had a good experience managing the loans. They have had a positive effect, including an increase in her sales and more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, instant soups, coffee, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Latifatou

texts.fr:
Latifatou est une femme âgée de 37 ans. Elle est mariée å un  coiffeur/vendeur. Elle a 4 enfants, dont 3 à l’école. Le premier a 16 ans et le dernier a 2 ans.  
Latifatou travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2005. Elle  vend des cigarettes et des allumettes pour tous clients dans une boutique. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, elle n’a pas de difficulté.
Latifatou a requis son 1 crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des cigarettes et des allumettes en gros. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Latifatou  voudrait agrandir son commerce. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de payer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en: Latifatou is a 37 year old woman. She is married to a hairdresser/vendor. She has four children, of whom three are in school. The first is sixteen years old and the last is two. Latifatou has worked as a retailer since 2005. She sells cigarettes and lighters for all the clients in a boutique. She purchases the products in Lomé. She works alone. At the moment, she has no difficulties. Latifatou has requested her first WAGES credit in order to purchase cigarettes and lighters in bulk. She wants to reinvest in the business. In the next years, Latifatou would like to expand her business. She says that with the profits, she plants to pay for her children's schooling.

loans.use: Purchase cigarettes and lighters

loans.name: Oscar

texts.en:
Meet 48 -year-old Oscar from Krootown, central area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married with 3 children between the ages of 17 years and 24 years. She has 6 additional dependents that live with her at home.  In 1996, Oscar established her building materials store in Krootown. She began her business because she was working as a secretary, but the salary she was receiving was insufficient for her to support her family. She works at the business from Monday until Sunday, 7 days per week and 12 hours a day from 7:00am -7:00pm. She also earns income from another business selling pork. She says that the main challenge to her business is high cost of transportation.

Oscar requires a loan in order to purchase more building materials such as switches, plugs, pump heads, nails, sinks, and wash hand basins. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to secure more goods for the store. In the future, Oscar plans to have a bigger building materials store in the country. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more switches, plugs, pump heads, nails, and sinks

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Marcos; el tiene 44 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de taller de mecanica,el arregla diferentes carros y tambien hace mantenimientos,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos,el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de taller de mecanica .El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para los carros y tambien comprar autopartes al por mayor.



El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Marcos is 44 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. He continues to manage his auto repair business. He fixes different cars and also performs maintenance. Marcos works alone from 8am to 6pm. Through his business, he is able to help his children move forward. Marcos wants to expand and improve his auto repair shop, so he is requesting a loan to buy auto parts and purchase them wholesale.

He is pleased with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to purchase auto parts in bulk.

loans.name: Nahun Arturo

texts.es:
Nahun, está iniciando su siembra agrícola, por esto solicita un préstamo para la compra de 4 sacos de abono y una bolsa de herbicidas,  él está contento con esta oportunidad de comprarse sus materiales para que nuevamente  las cosechas sean abundantes y sanas. 
Él ha mejorado su capacidad de agricultor y con la cosecha anterior puedo generar ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Nahun is starting to plant his crops, so he is requesting a loan to buy four sacks of compost and a bag of herbicide. He is pleased with this opportunity to buy his materials so that his crops are abundant and healthy once again.

Nahun is improving in his capacity as a farmer. With his previous harvest, he was able to generate income for his family.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of compost and a bag of herbicide.

loans.name: Bérétchissou

texts.fr:
Bérétchissou est une femme âgée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 1 enfant de 32 ans.
Bérétchissou travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1986. Elle vend des tissus pour tous clients. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, elle n’a pas de difficulté.
Bérétchissou a requis son crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des tissus. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Bérétchissou voudrait agrandir son commerce. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Bérétchissou is a 47 year old woman. She is married to a driver. She has one child who is 32 years old. Bérétchissou has worked as a retailer since 1986. She sells fabrics to all clients. She purchases the products in Lomé. She works alone. At the moment, she has no difficulties. Bérétchissou has requested a WAGES loan in order to buy fabrics. She wants to reinvest in the business. In the next years, Bérétchissou would like to increase her business. She says that with her profits, she plans to improve the life of her family.

loans.use: Purchase fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beef for sale

loans.name: Suliaman

texts.en:
Suliaman, a 37-year-old married father of two children, ages 8 and 11, both attending school, has been runing a retail provision store in Goderich, located in the western area of Freetown, Sierra Leone, for 15 years. His wife is a petty trader, and he also has two relatives that he takes care of.

Suliaman’s store sells items such as milk, sugar, luncheon meat, baby food and mayonnaise. He also earns income from renting out a house. He says that the main challenge to his business is insufficient capital to expand his range of products in his store. He is therefore requesting this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more provision items. Suliaman says that the extra income from this loan will help him educate his children and improve their welfare, and in the future, he would like to extend his business to other areas of the city. He is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more milk, baby food, mayonnaise and luncheon meat.

loans.name: Karim Patricia

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Karim; ella tiene 37 años de edad, separada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de reposteria,ella prepara tortas,galletas y postres,ella trabaja en forma independiente,la socia tambien trabaja en una distribuidora de medicamentos,por medio de este negocio y este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de reposteria.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como harina,azucar,mantequilla y utensilios al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Karim is 37 years old, separated from her spouse, and has two children. She now has a dessert business where she prepares cakes, cookies, and pastries. Karim works independently. She also works at a medicine distribution center. Through her business and her job, she is able to help her children move forward. Karim wants to expand her dessert business, so she is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as flour, sugar, butter, and utensils in bulk.

She is grateful to everyone who helped her to fulfill her dream, so she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, butter, and utensils in bulk.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina es socia del Banco Comunal Nacer, tiene un recreo donde vende comidas típicas, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 20 años, los primeros préstamos que recibió los invirtió en la compra de insumos y algunos equipos para su negocio, gracias a sus  ahorros logró implementar su capital de trabajo, le gusta trabajar con Finca por la facilidad de créditos que le dan, además le ayuda mucho porque es la única que educa a sus hijos, le gusta recibir charlas para poder orientar a su familia y aconsejarlos bien.
el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra cervezas e insumos para la cocina. Su meta es sacar profesional a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Justina is a member of the Communal Bank “Nacer” (To Be Born) and has a café where she sells traditional dishes. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 20 years. The first loans she received were invested in the purchase of supplies and some equipment for her business. Thanks to her savings, she has been able to maintain her operating capital. Justina enjoys working with FINCA because of the loan services that are provided. In addition, the loans have been a great help because they are the only way for her to provide her children with an education. She likes the seminars because they have helped her to manage her family and provide them with good advice.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of beer and cooking supplies. Her goal is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy beer and cooking supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Warama

texts.fr:
Warama est une femme âgée de 41 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 4 enfants, dont 2 à l’école. Le premier a 15 ans et le dernier a 1 an.  
Warama travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2001. Elle vend des ignames pour tous clients, ambulante. Elle achète les produits à lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, n’a pas de difficulté. 
Warama a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des ignames. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Warama voudrait agrandir son commerce. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’envoyer tous ses enfants à l’école.
texts.en: Warama is a 41 year old woman. She is married to a driver. She has four children, two of whom are in school. The first is fifteen years old and the last is a year. Warama has worked in retail since 2001. She sells yams to clients while traveling. She buys the products in Lomé. She works alone. At the moment, she has no difficulties. Warama has requested her first WAGES loan in order to purchase yams. She wants to reinvest in the business. In the next years, Warama would like to grow her business. She says that with her profits, she plans to send all her children to school.

loans.use: Purchase yams

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es socia del Banco Comunal Nacer, tiene un taller de confección de faldas, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 1 año y medio, con el primer préstamo que recibió compró telas para su taller, le gusta trabajar con Finca por la facilidad de créditos y porque aprendió ahorrar, le gusta las capacitaciones porque le enseña a ser puntual, responsable con su familia y los créditos.
el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra telas. Su meta es vender sus productos fuera de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Margarita is a member of the Communal Bank “Nacer” (To Be Born). She has a workshop where she produces skirts. Margarita has been a member of FINCA Peru for a year and a half. With the first loan she received, she bought fabrics for her workshop. She enjoys working with FINCA for the loan services and because she has learned how to save. Margarita likes the training classes because she has learned how to be punctual and responsible with her family and the loans.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of fabrics. Her goal is to sell her products outside of the city.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Marta Julia

texts.es:
Marta, necesita mejorar el negocio, invirtiendo en los materiales mas necesarios como maiz, tomates, papas, chile, carnes, condimentos, gas propano,esto le ayudara para incrementar su produccion de alimentos, mejorando la atencion y el servicio hacia los clientes.
Ella ha incrementado sus ganancias en el negocio y sus clientes estan satisfechos con el servicio, tambien su familia ha sido beneficiada con este progreso de Marta.
texts.en:
Marta needs to improve her business by investing in necessary supplies such as corn, tomatoes, potatoes, chili peppers, meat, condiments, and propane gas. This will help increase her production of food and improve the service she provides to her customers.

Marta will increase her earnings from her business and her customers will be satisfied with the service. As a result of this progress, her family will also benefit.

loans.use: to buy corn, tomatoes, potatoes, chili peppers, meat, condiments, and propane gas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the first fees of a new moto taxi

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sorbets, sorbet cups, cones, popsicles, and other products.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma es socia del Banco Comunal Desarrollo, tiene 30 años, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 1 año. Norma tiene un taller de confección de mandiles, faldas y fustanes, anteriormente ella solo vendía mandiles fustanes en poca cantidad, pero gracias a la ayuda de Finca empezó ahorrar y con los créditos que le daban fácilmente logro abrir su propio taller en el cual ahora le va bien, le gusta recibir la capacitaciones porque le enseña ahorrar, a ser puntual, responsable y sobre los valores. el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de telas y blondas para confeccionar fustanes ahora que se acercan los carnavales. Su meta es tener su propio capital y comprarse un carro.
texts.en:
Norma is a partner of Desarrollo Communal Bank. She is 30 years old, has 2 children and has been a partner of FINCA Perú for a year.

She owns a clothes making studio, where she makes aprons, skirts and half-slips.

Previously, she only sold small amounts of aprons and half-slips, but thanks to FINCA's help, she started to save money and with the loans they granted her she was easily able to set up her own clothes making studio.

Now, her studio is a profitable business. She likes to receive training because she learns about savings, punctuality, responsibility and moral values.

She will use the requested loan to buy fabrics and laces to make half-slips, now that Carnival time is approaching.

Her goal is to have her own working capital and buy a car.

loans.use: To buy fabrics and laces.

loans.name: Nidia Marjorie

texts.es:
Nidia, tiene la necesidad de invertir un nuevo préstamo, por eso solicita uno para invertirlo en camisas, blusas casuales, pantalones y lencería, esta nueva inversión se debe al tiempo navideño, donde los clientes demandan más mercadería para regalar y estrenar ropa nueva. 
Ella espera que este préstamo traiga más bendiciones y ganancias al negocio, que sea igual de provechoso que el anterior, ya que fue una gran experiencia para ella; Hasta el momento se mantiene con sus condiciones familiares.
texts.en:
Nidia needs a new loan, so she is requesting one that she plans to invest in buying shirts, casual tops, pants, and lingerie. She needs this new investment for the holiday season, when her customers request more merchandise to give as gifts and to show off new clothing during the holidays.
She hopes that this loan brings her business more blessings and greater earnings, and that it be as beneficial as the previous loan, which was a wonderful experience for her. At the moment, she is in the same family situation as before.

loans.use: to buy shirts, casual tops, pants, and lingerie.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Fidel Atilio

texts.es:
Fidel, se encuentra solicitando un nuevo préstamo, pues necesita fortalecer su taller y comprarse madera, barniz, pintura, para mantener en la carpintería y poder realizar los pedidos de los clientes.
Fidel tiene el compromiso de abastecer materiales el taller, porque le gusta agradar a los clientes, fabricando los muebles a su gusto y según la necesidad, él considera que este dinero le ayuda mucho para el negocio, para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Fidel is asking for a new loan because he needs to strengthen his workshop and buy wood, varnish and paint to keep up with his carpentry and finish his customers' orders. 

Fidel needs supplies for his workshop because he likes to make his customers happy, making custom furniture for their taste and needs. He thinks this money will help him and his family a lot with the business.

loans.use: to buy wood, varnish and paint.

loans.name: Angélica Maria

texts.es:
La señora Angélica solicita el préstamo para surtir su negocio, ya que comenta que últimamente debido a la inseguridad sólo puede tener abierto su negocio de día. 
Sin embargo no ha tenido suficientes ventas y esto le genera pocas ganancias.
Ellos han decidido poner una solución a su problema, lo que implicará que la señora Angélica abra el negocio durante el día y su esposo se encargará de hacerlo por las noches, ya que es cuando se vende más la comida preparada, como son los tacos de carne asada y los lonches. 
Con esta inversión podrán tener más variedad de guisos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y así tendrán más ganancias para la familia, ya que tiene dos hijos estudiando.
texts.en:
Angelica requests a loan to stock her store. Recently, because of lack of security, she has been able to open her store during the day, but hasn't had enough merchandise to sell door to door so she isn't making as much money. 

Along with her husband, Angelica has found a solution to the problem, which is that she will work at the store during the day, and her husband will help at night, which is when she sells food like beef tacos and snacks.

With this loan they can have a greater variety of stews to offer her customers and will earn more money for her family. They have two children who are in school.

loans.use: to buy meat, bread, legumes to make stews and sell them.

loans.name: Nemesia

texts.es:
Nemesia es socia del Banco Comunal Amor Divino, tiene 46 años, es madre de 2 hijos, vende ropa en ferias, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 1 año, los primeros préstamos que recibió los invirtió en la compra de ropas, le gusta las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal porque le enseña a ahorrar a ser puntual, responsable con el dinero y la familia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropas y mandiles. 
Su meta comprar una lancha para transportar sus productos.
texts.en:
Nemesia is a member of the Amor Divino (Divine Love) communal bank.  She’s 46 years old and the mother of two children.  She sells clothing at different fairs and has been a FINCA Peru member for one year.  She invested her initial loans into clothing.  She likes the training she gets in her communal bank because they teach her to be punctual and responsible with money and family.  She is asking for this loan to buy clothing and aprons.

Her goal is to buy a boat to transport her products.

loans.use: to buy clothing and aprons

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy calves and a pig.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to her bathroom and to replace the sewage pipes, which will help maintain her family's hygiene.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fruit for making fresh juices, canned juices, sugar, milk, small candies and cookies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María del Rosario, tiene 46 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 14 años de edad, uno de ellos estudia, tiene 17 años de casada, vive en una aldea de Taulabe, Comayagua.

Doña María, tiene establecida una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como azúcar, arroz, leche en polvo, pastas, huevos, manteca, harina,lacteos, embutidos, productos de limpieza, maíz y frijoles. Desde hace 15 años realiza esta actividad. Inició vendiendo granos básicos y verduras, ahora ya tiene surtido y buena clientela, trabaja todo el día y todos los días.

A solicitado 5 prestamos a ODEF para surtir el negocio, el préstamo actual lo solicita para comprar varios quintales de maíz y otros productos comestibles para la venta.

Su meta es tener un negocio grande para vender más y de allí lograr que se gradúen sus hijos.
texts.en:
María del Rosario, age 46, has two children, ages 5 and 14.  One of them goes to school.  She has been married for 17 years, and she lives in the village of Taulabe, Comayagua.

María has a grocery store where she sells staple products like sugar, rice, powered milk, pasta, eggs, lard, flour, dairy products, sausages, cleaning products, corn, and beans.  She has been doing this for 15 years.  She started by selling basic grains and vegetables.  Now her business is well stocked, and she has good customers.  She works all day every day.

She has requested five loans from ODEF in order to stock the business.  The current loan she is requesting is to buy several “quintales” (a quintal is about 100 pounds) of corn and other food products to sell.

Her goal is to have a large business in order to sell more and from there to manage get her children to graduate.

loans.use: to buy several “quintales” (a quintal is about 100 pounds) of corn and other food products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking fuel.

loans.name: Carmen Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa sigue participando en el banco comunal “Comuzone III” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. 

Teresa sigue dedicándose a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende otro tipo de productos como golosinas, fideos, gaseosa entre otros. Teresa con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios.  

En esta oportunidad Teresa requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería para su tienda de abarrotes y así tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes. 

Teresa está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Teresa continues to participate in the “Comuzone III” communal bank of the Arariwa association in Cusco.

She continues to sell primary needs products, such as rice, sugar, and milk.  She also sells other types of products, like snacks, noodles, and soft drinks among others.  Teresa benefited from her previous loan and things went well for her.

Now she needs a loan to buy more merchandise for her grocery store.  In this way she’ll be able to have a greater variety to offer to her customers.

Teresa is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina, de 38 años; vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Eulogio de 42 años y sus 03 hijos quienes son el motivo de su esfuerzo. Marina, juntamente con su esposo, desde muy temprano se van a la chacra para poder ver sus plantas de cacao y frutas cítricas como: naranja, mandarina, etc. Gracias a sus cultivos puede sustentar los gastos escolares de sus hijos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver a diario como va el avance de su cultivo para luego esperar la cosecha; lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es no poder combatir con la plaga de insectos que perjudican su producción. Pero aún así esta dispuesta a sembrar más plantas de cacao en sus tierras. Con el crédito solicitado podrá comprar plantas de cacao para incrementar su productividad y tener además productos de calidad. Este será su préstamo número 02 con MFP, por lo que espera de su colaboración para poder concretar sus planes. Con los 2,00 nuevos soles, podrá comprar plantas de cacao para ampliar la siembra, además comprará abono para asegurar una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Marina is 38 years old and lives in a home of her own, along with her husband, 42 year old Eulogio, and her three children who are her motivation for her efforts.  Marina and her husband go to the fields very early each morning, to trim their cacao and citrus fruit plants. (oranges, mandarin oranges, etc.)  Thanks to her crops, they can pay for their children’s schooling expenses.  What she likes the best about her work is to be able to see the daily progress of her crop while she awaits the harvest.  She’s been doing this for 20 years and considers the most difficult part to be fighting the insects that damage her production.

Now she is ready to plant more cacao in her fields.  The money from this loan will allow her to buy cacao plants to increase her production and have quality products.  This will be her second loan though MFP and she awaits it to be able to solidify her plans.  She will use the 2,000 PEN ($750) to buy cacao plans to expand her production.  She will also buy fertilizer to ensure that she has a good harvest.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing and Thermoses.

loans.name: Maurino

texts.es: Maurino, de 61 años esta casado con Silvia, de 65; viven en su propia casa junto a sus 03 hijos, a quienes desea ofrecer un buen futuro. Marino, es un hombre muy trabajador, tiene una carpintería en la cual realiza diferentes tipos de muebles como: camas, roperos, mesas, sillas, entre otros muebles. El trabajo que ejecuta Marino, es de mucho esfuerzo y dedicación y lo hace para no quedar mal con sus clientes. A pesar de su edad hace buenos trabajos, comprando madera de calidad y así ofrecer muebles de calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es dejar contentos a sus clientes por su trabajo y considera que lo más difícil es traer madera de otros lugares hasta la ciudad de Quimbiri; ya que al momento de  subirlas al carro tiene que cargar. Con el crédito solicitado podrá comprar madera para seguir realizando su trabajo. Este será su préstamo número 07 con MFP, por consiguiente espera de su colaboración para concretar su objetivo. En su banco comunal se lleva bien con sus compañeros y la agrada ser parte ello ya que son responsables y solidarios. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará madera para seguir elaborando muebles.
texts.en:
Maurino is 61 years old and married to 65 year old Silvia.  They live in a home of their own along with their 3 children to whom they want to offer a good future.  Maurino is a hardworking man.  He has a carpentry shop where he makes different types of furniture, such as beds, wardrobes, tables, and chairs, among others.  Mario does his work with great effort and dedication, and he makes sure that his customers are satisfied.  He does good work despite his age.  He buys quality lumber and offers quality furniture.  What he likes most about his work is leaving his customers satisfied with his work.  The most difficult part is bringing the lumber to Quimbiri from other places; he needs to carry it from the time he loads it into the car.

The money from this loan will allow him to buy lumber so that he can continue to work.  This will be his seventh loan through MFP and he awaits your contribution so that he can achieve his objective.  He gets along well with the members of his communal bank and he’s glad to be part of it because the members are united and responsible.  He will use the 1,000 PEN to buy lumber so that he can continue working.

loans.use: to buy lumber

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, shorts, blouses, skirts, brassieres, boxers, stockings and socks for men and women.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies for her nutrition center.

loans.name: Esthela

texts.es:
Actualmente el negocio de la señora Esthela le esta haciendo falta mas variedad de producto y con el préstamo desea aumentar las ventas y ofrecer a sus clientes los productos de lácteos, verduras y carnes frías.
Doña Esthela  es quien atiende personalmente su negocio desde hace un año y su esposo realiza trabajos de herrería y de electricidad con estos ingresos solventan los gastos de su familia ay que tiene dos hijos uno de 10 años y un bebe de tan solo un año. 
Desean darle lo mejor y que tengan una vida sin falta de necesidades económicas.
texts.en:
Esthela’s current business needs a greater variety of products and she would like to use the money from this loan to increase her sales and offer milk products, vegetables, and cold meats to her customers.

Esthela has personally been running the business for a year.  Her husband works in metalwork and is an electrician and they cover the family expenses with these incomes.  They have two children, ages ten and one.

They want to provide the best for their children and ensure that they are not in need of anything financially.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Petrona Maritza

texts.es:
Doña Petrona sigue, laborando en servicios domesticos, siendo su medio de apoyar a su familia, que junto a su esposo logran cada dia,  una vivienda digna, el trabaja de electricista, de sus cinco hijos, cuatro cursan la secundaria y el mayor, comenzara la universidad.
Petrona logro con su credito anterior pegar ceramica en la cocina, quedando muy bonita, ahora comprara ceramica para pegar en la sala, y asi ir abanzando  por parte, hasta terminar, dando una mejor vision, mejor comodidad de limpieza, haciendose posible, gracias a los financiamiento, por ser a plazos accesibles, estando la situacion economica costosa cada dia.
texts.en: Petrona keeps working in domestic services as a way to support her family. She and her husband, an electrician, work every day for a dignified home for their five children, four of whom are in school and the eldest attends a university. Petrona used her previous loan to put down ceramic tile in her kitchen, making it very pretty, and now she plans to buy tile to put down in her living room. She will keep going until the whole house is finished, making it better looking, more comfortable and cleaner. All this is possible thanks to the loans, in installments, with the daily expensive economic situation.

loans.use: to purchase ceramic tile to put down in her living room, making her house cleaner and more hygienic.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cellular phones, including Nokia 6120, Movistar, Sony Ericsson w580 and Blackberry Pearl devices.

loans.name: Matilde Ramon

texts.es: Don Matilde de 50 años de edad, de  oficio agricultor, originario de Pueblo Nueva municipio de Estelí , tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 17 años de edad respectivamente , con 29 años de experiencia en esta actividad. Su padre le enseño a sembrar tabaco quien vendía su cosecha a una empresa Tabacalera en Estelí desde entonces ha adquirido experiencia con este tipo de cultivo. Además se dedica a la siembra de maíz pero siente que le hace falta equipos modernos que le ayuden hacer mas rápido su proceso de siembra y reducir costos. Es por ello que requiere el préstamo para comprar un motor de riego para utilizarlo en el proceso de hidratación de sus cultivos. Por lo pronto le gustaría ampliar sus áreas de siembra.
texts.en: Matilde is 50 years old and is a farmer by trade. He's originally from Pueblo Nueva in the municipality of Estelí. He has two children, ages 14 and 17, and has 29 years of experience as a farmer. His father taught him how to plant tobacco, which his father would sell to a company in Estelí. Ever since then he has been gaining experience with this type of cultivation. He makes a living planting corn, but he lacks modern machinery that would quicken the planting process and reduce his costs. It's for this reason he is requesting an irrigation system that he can use to water his crops. He would like to expand his planting area very soon.

loans.use: to purchase an irrigation system.

loans.name: Jesús Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Jesús Antonio esta solicitando un crédito con nosotros por desea poner una barda de block para separar su casa de la de enseguida y también para tener seguridad al dejar los carros afuera.  
       El señor Jesús Antonio  trabaja en una fabrica como técnico, y en sus tiempos libres se dedica a reparar aparatos electrónicos en su casa, y también cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos desde hace aproximadamente dos años ya que  inicio un  pequeño de negocio con su cuñado el cual es básicamente ambientar los eventos sociales y el cual representa un ingreso extra para el y para su cuñado.
Don Jesús Antonio es originario de Coahuila pero ya tiene tiempo residiendo aquí en Nuevo Laredo, ya que aquí ya formo una familia con su esposa Marveliz y con su hijo, al cual ambos se esfuerzan por darle lo mejor.
texts.en:
Jesús Antonio is asking for a loan because he wants to build a cinder block wall to separate his house from the one next door, and to improve security when he leaves his cars outside.

Jesús Antonio works as a technician in a factory and he repairs electrical appliances in his spare time.  He’s also had another source of income for the past two years; he started a small business with his brother-in-law, which basically consists of providing the set-up for social events.  This represents an extra income for him and his brother-in-law.

Jesús Antonio is originally from Coahuila, but he’s been living in Nuevo Laredo for some time.  He established his family with his wife Marveliz and his son, to who they both strive to provide the best.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Esperanza Del Soc0Rro

texts.es:
Esperanza es originaria del Coyolito municipio de Jinotega, casada, es madre de 6 hijos de los cuales 4 están a su cargo, combina su papel de madre de familia con la de agricultora pues se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas labores propia de su comunidad donde las mujeres aportan en sus hogares apoyando en las siembras de hortalizas y granos básicos. Cuando comenzó lo hizo cultivando chiltoma a medias con sus vecinos donde juntos se unieron para sembrar una parcela de esta hortaliza pero hace dos años ella siembra de manera independiente le  ha ido muy bien por que no ha tenido perdidas en sus cultivos. 
Ella realizo el crédito para sembrar chiltomas. Pues en sus planes esta ampliar sus áreas de siembras para que sus hijos sea lo s que en el futuro manejen el negocio pues su meta es que ellos se preparan y se hagan cargo del negocio cuando ella se retire. Por el momento quiere fortalecer su negocio y hacerlo sostenible.
texts.en: Esperanza is originally from Coyolito, municipality of Jinotega. She is married and has six children, four still under her care. She balances her motherly duties with being a farmer, since she makes a living planting vegetables. The women in her community support their families by planting vegetables and basic grains. When she started she was cultivating sweet peppers alongside her neighbors, who came together to plant a parcel of land with the vegetable, but two years ago she started working independently and it has been going very well since she hasn't lost any of her crops. She plans to use the loan to plant sweet peppers. Her plan is to expand her planting area so that her children can manage the business in the future, since her goal is to prepare them to take over the business when she retires. For the moment, she wants to strengthen her business and make it sustainable.

loans.use: to plant sweet peppers.

loans.name: Omar Geovany

texts.es:
El joven Omar es una persona que tuvo la ilusión de montar su propio negocio para el sustento de su familia y un éxito en su vida como comerciante. 

Omar tiene 31 años de edad y es casado. Su esposa es maestra, y la pareja tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad. Es propietario de una pulperia desde hace 3 años, la cual tiene mucha aceptación en la colonia donde vive ya que Omar es una persona sana y emprendedor. Es muy conocido y esto lleva que a sus cliente lo prefieren por el buen servicio que él presta. Su negocio es bastante organizado y visible al publico. Vende productos de la canasta básica, refrescos, golosinas y carnes. 

Solicitó este crédito de L15,000 para surtir la pulpería con la compra de granos básicos, refrescos y golosinas. Omar quiere crecer el negocio con su buena administración y que su familia vea el logro que se ha forjado.
texts.en:
Omar is a young person who had the dream of starting his own business in order to support his family and to become a successful merchant.

Omar, age 31, is married.  His wife is a teacher.  The couple has a three year old child.  He has had a grocery store for three years.  The store is well accepted in the neighborhood where he lives.  This is because he is a healthy and enterprising person.  He is well-known, and his customers prefer him because of his good service.  His business is very organized and visible to the public.  He sells food staples, soft drinks, sweets, and meat.

He requested this loan for 15,000 lempiras to stock his grocery store with the purchase of basic grains, soft drinks, and sweets.  Omar want to grow the business with his good management.  He also wants his family to see the achievement that he has forged.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft drinks, and sweets.

loans.name: Alquimer

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Alquimer le esta haciendo falta el vitropiso en toda la casa el que tiene actualmente ya esta en malas condiciones. Solicita el préstamo para comprar el vitropiso y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora. 
Don Alquimer esta casado tiene dos hijos pequeños, el trabaja como empleado de una tienda comercial y su esposos como asistente de medico en la clínica del seguro social. Desean realizar las mejoras a su casa para tener un mejor patrimonio para su familia.
texts.en:
Señor Alquimer's entire house needs new vitropiso (Mexican glassed floor tiles) as what is currently in place is in poor condition. He is asking for the loan in order to buy vitropiso and pay for the mabour to install it. 

Don Alquimer is married and has 2 small children. He works in a department storeas an employess and his wife works as a medical aide at the social security clinic. They want to make the improvements to their house to have a better family asset.

loans.use: to install  vitropiso (Mexican glassed floor tiles).

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Fernando le esta haciendo falta los acabados del interior, ya que le esta haciendo falta  pintar y realizarle algunos detalles. Solicita el préstamo para comprar la pintura especial y así le dure más tiempo los acabados. 
Don Fernando tiene ya mas de 20 años trabajando en un agencia aduanal y su esposa de dedica al hogar ya viven solos, sus hijos ya están casados y tiene su propia familia. 
Desean mejorar su patrimonio y que este en buenas condiciones. 
El señor Fernando ya ha tenido dos créditos con KIVA los cuales han pagados puntualmente y han sido para mejorar su vivienda, desea contar nuevamente con su cooperación en este nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Fernando’s house lacks interior finishing.  It needs to be painted, and some details need to be taken care of.

He is requesting the loan to buy special paint so that the finishing will last longer.

Fernando has worked in a customs agency for over 20 years.  His wife devotes herself to the home.  They now live alone; their children are married and have their own families. 

They wish to improve their legacy, and they want it to be in good condition. 

Fernando has had two Kiva loans, which he repaid punctually. They have been to improve his house.  He wishes to count on your cooperation again with this new loan.

loans.use: to buy paint to finish the interior of the house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Doris Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doris, se dedica a la venta de tamales, actualmente vive con sus dos hijos, es madre soltera, ella se levanta desde muy temprano a preparar lo que necesita para hacer los tamales, aprendió este negocio por su madre desde hace 15 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales como maíz, pollo, condimentos, para preparar los tamales. Este préstamo será una gran inversión para Doris, ya que le dará la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos.
La aspiración de ella es trabajar de forma responsable con el préstamo, mejorando su calidad de comerciante y proveyendo para su familia lo mejor.
texts.en:
Doris sells tamales. She currently lives with her 2 children. She is a single mother and gets up very early to prepare what she needs to make the tamales. She learned the business from her mother more than 15 years ago.

She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients such as corn, chicken, seasonings to make tamales. This loan will be a great investment for Doris as it will give her the opportunity to improve her income. She aspires to work responsibly with the loan, improving the quality of her business and providing the best for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, seasonings to make tamales.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Carmen y su esposo están viviendo en una casa de renta, y desean tener su propia vivienda, es por eso que están solicitando un préstamo para pagar el enganche que les piden para la compra de un terreno y empezar a construir su propio patrimonio ya que son personas mayores de edad. 
Doña Carmen se dedica a la venta de perfumes afuera de su domicilio y su esposo tiene una vulcanizadora (reparación de llantas para carros). 
Ya no quieren seguir pagando renta ya que les está cobrando mucho y prefieren invertir en un lugar seguro para ellos.
texts.en:
Señora Carmen and her husband live in rented accomodation. They want their own home which is why they are asking for a loan to make the down payment on a plot of land to start building their own home as they are already elderly people

Doña Carmen sells perfume outside her home and her husband has a tyre repair workshop for cars. They do not want to continue paying rent as they are being charged a lot and prefer to invest in a safe place for themselves.

loans.use: to make a downpayment for a plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy CDs, DVDs, rubber shoes.

loans.name: Dolores Margarita

texts.es:
Dolores, vive en casa propia, junto a su familia, ella junto a su padre administran un negocio de accesorios para el hogar, juguetería y calzado, este surgió por la necesidad de tener un empleo, desde hace 5 años inicio, trabaja de 7:00am a 6:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de accesorios para el hogar y jugueterías para ofrecer en esta temporada que se avecina, esta inversión le servirá para que su negocio este surtido de todo los artículos que puedan demandar los clientes. 
La aspiración de ella es que este préstamo sea una buena inversión, crecer hasta llegar a ser una microempresaria instalando su propio almacén.
texts.en:
Dolores lives in her own house with her family. Together with her father, she manages a home furnishings, toy and footwear business. This came about through the need to have a job. They started the business 5 years ago and work from 7:00am til 6:00pm.

She is asking for a loan to buy home furnishings and toys to sell in the upcoming season. This investment will serve to stock her business with an assortment of items her customers might ask for. She aspires for the loan to be a good investment, grow her business to a micro-enterprise with a department store of their own.

loans.use: to buy home furnishings and toys.

loans.name: Gloria Isabel

texts.es: Gloria, solicita un nuevo préstamo para utilizarlo en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para surtir el negocio, ella se decidió por la necesidad de incrementar su inventario de productos, espera que con la compra sean mejores ventas y la respuesta con una buena atención a los clientes, ella comprará huevos, embutidos, gaseosas, jugo, galletas y boquitas, esperando tener buenos resultados y una mejor rentabilidad en este nuevo proyecto, ella logró tener un efecto positivo del préstamo anterior, ha mejorado el negocio y la condición de su familia.
texts.en: Gloria is asking for a new loan to use in the purchase of staple products to stock her store. She decided to ask for a loan as she needed to expand her inventory of products. She hopes that with this purchase her sales will be better and she will respond with good customer service. She will buy eggs, cured meats and sausages, soft drinks, juices, biscuits and snacks. She is hoping for good results and improved profitability with this new project. She managed to achieve a positive effect with the previous loan; her business has improved as has her family's situation.

loans.use: to buy eggs, cured meats and sausages, soft drinks, juices, biscuits and snacks.

loans.name: Mayra Soledad

texts.es:
La señora Mayra Soledad trabaja en una farmacia y su esposo es empleado de una tienda de tortillas, tiene una hija pequeña, actualmente están pagando su casa pero desean empezar la construcción de un cuarto ya que necesitan mas espacio en la casa. 
Solicitan el préstamo para comprar el material (block, arena, cemento, varilla y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejorar). Ya que desean mejorar la calidad de vida y el patrimonio de su hija.
texts.en:
Mayra Soledad works in a pharmacy, and her husband is employed at a tortilla store. She has a small daughter. Right now they are paying for their house but want to begin construction on a room, since they need more space in the house. 

They are asking for the loan to buy materials (cinderblock, sand, cement, rods, and to pay the person who will be in charge of doing it better). This is because they want to improve their quality of life and the wealth of their daughter.

loans.use: to begin the construction of a room on the front of the house.

loans.name: Mayela

texts.es: Mayela, de 29 años convive con Rusbel de 33 años; viven en casa alquilada junto a su pequeña hija Deni de 02 años, a quien desean darle lo mejor para el futuro. Mayela, es una mujer con muchas ganas de sobresalir en la vida y darle un buen futuro a su hija. La labor que realiza Mayela, es comprar terrenos a un precio menor, para luego venderlas a un precio que pueda solventar los gastos de su familia; hace 02 años que realiza esta actividad con la ayuda de su pareja. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder llevarse muy bien con la gente a quienes compra y vende sus terrenos y considera que lo más difícil es no poder comprarse un terreno propio ya que desea dar lo mejor a su pequeña. Mayela con el préstamo solicitado desea comprar un terreno y luego venderlo para el sustento de su hogar. Este es su préstamo número 05 con MFP, de la misma forma espera su colaboración para continuar con su objetivo. Así mismo agradece a su banco comunal por trabajar con personas que la apoyan. Con lo 3,000 nuevos soles, podrá seguir trabajando en la actividad a la que realiza comprar un terreno y luego venderlo para el sustento de su hogar.
texts.en:
Mayela is 29 years old and lives with her partner Rusbel who is 33.  They live in a rental house together with their young daughter Deni who is 2 years old.  They love their daughter and would like to provide her with the best for her future.

Mayela is a woman who has a great desire to do well in life and provide her daughter with a good future.  Her business is buying plots of land at low prices and then selling them at a price which can cover her family's expenses.  She has been working in this business for two years with the help of her partner.  What Mayela most likes about her work is being able to get on really well with the people from whom she buys and those to whom she sells her plots of land and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be not being able to buy a plot of land of her own as she would like to give her little one the best in life.  Mayela would like to use the loan she has requested to buy a plot of land and then sell it so that she can provide for her household. 

This will be Mayela's fifth loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue achieving her goals.  She is grateful for her community bank and the fact that she works with people who support her.  She will use her 3,000 soles to continue working in her business, buying a plot of land and then selling it to provide for her household.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to sell

loans.name: Sonia Maribel

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 29 años y vive en la aldea Independencia en el municipio de La Lima. Ella es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo de 6 años, lo cual está estudiando en la escuela. 

Sonia vive junto a sus padres y realiza dos actividades de negocio desde hace 4 años. Juntamente con su familia, ella elabora y vende tortillas. Hace tortillas todo el día y allí mismo aprovecha a ofrecer productos Vogue. Ella vende cremas, lociones, perfumes, cremas faciales y champú entre otros productos. Sonia cuenta con la ayuda de una persona quien distribuye los pedidos y cobros de los productos. Ella comenzó el negocio con sus ahorros y los invirtió en productos. 

Actualmente solicitó un crédito de L10,000 para surtir su negocio y comprar productos como cremas, acondicionador y champú. Va a aprovechar la temporada navideña para incrementar las ventas.
texts.en:
Sonia is 29 years old and lives in the village of Independencia, in the La Lima municipality.  She is a single mother of a 6-year-old son, who attends school.

Sonia lives with her parents and has been undertaking her business activities for the last four years.  Together with her family, she prepares and sells tortillas.  She makes tortillas all day long, and at the same time she also has the advantage of selling beauty products.  She sells creams, lotions, perfumes, face creams, and shampoo, among other things.  Sonia has the help of someone who distributes her products to people who have placed orders or made purchases on charge.  She began  the business using her savings, which she invested in products.

She is currently requesting a loan of L10,000 to stock up her business and purchase products such as creams, conditioner and shampoo.  She wants to take advantage of the Christmas season to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy products such as creams, conditioner, and shampoo.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro, de 44 años convive con Berta de 43 años; viven en casa propia junto a sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes desea ofrecer un mejor futuro. Pedro, es un hombre muy trabajador con el arduo esmero que dedica a su trabajo trata de sobresalir ante las dificultades del destino. Pedro es comerciante tiene un a pequeña tienda de abarrotes ubicado en el distrito de Quimbiri. La bodega de Pedro desde muy temprano abre las puertas de su negocio para luego recibir a sus primero compradores, sabiendo la variedad de la mercadería que tiene en su tienda no dudan en comprarle, ya que tienen la seguridad de poder encontrar los productos que necesitan. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y así estar al tanto de las cosas que pasan en su barrio, lleva 04 meses que empezó con su negocio y considera que lo mas difícil es permanecer de pie casi todo el día. Con el crédito solicitado comprara más víveres para su negocio y así abastecerse de mercadería. Este es su préstamo numero 07 con MFP, esta contento por saber que obtendrá un apoyo financiero el la cual podrá cumplir con su trabajo. Asimismo. agradece a su banco comunal por trabajar responsablemente. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, podrá comprar productos para incrementar su tienda como: arroz, variedades de bebidas, fideos, azúcar, conservas, etc.
texts.en:
Pedro, aged 44, lives with Berta, who is 43, in their own house, together with their 3 dear children for whom they wish to offer a better future. Pedro is a hard-working man with an ardent concern to dedicate himself to working to overcome the difficulties presented by destiny. Pedro is a merchant with a tiny grocery store located in the Quimbiri district.

Pedro opens the doors of his store very early to receive the first customers, who can be sure to find the merchandise they need. What he likes most about his work is conversing with his customers and keeping on top of what occurs in his barrio.

It has been 4 months since he began his business and he finds the most difficult part staying on his feet almost all day. With the solicited loan he will purchase more groceries for his business and resupply the store with merchandise.

This will be Pedro's 7th loan through MFP and he is content  to know that he will obtain the financial help that makes it possible for him to continue his work. At the same time, he is grateful to his communal bank for working so responsibly. With the 1,500 new sols Pedro will buy products to improve his inventory, including rice, a variety of drinks, beans, sugar, preserves, etc.

loans.use: buy rice, a variety of drinks, beans, sugar and preserves to sell.

loans.name: Romel

texts.es: Romel, un joven de 18 años quien desea sobresalir en la vida; vive en casa de su mamá Yolanda de 42 años, a quien apoya darle lo mejor. Romel, es un joven animoso de salir y triunfar en la vida. Se dedica a la construcción donde su principal actividad es ayudar a sus compañeros de trabajo a cargar elementos que necesiten como fierros, tierra, entre otros. En esta actividad viene trabajando 01mes; desde que su padre falleció, como hijo mayor ayuda a su madre con los gastos de su casa. Con el tiempo desea abrir una tienda para su madre, para que pueda estar tranquila y tener una forma de poder apoyar con los gastos de su hogar, mientras que Romel trabaja en las construcciones. Este será su préstamo número 01 con MFP y está muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo; al igual agradece a su banco comunal por darle la oportunidad de poder trabajar con ellos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará productos como: arroz, azúcar, conservas, golosina, bebidas, entre otros, así podrá abrir la tienda de su madre.
texts.en:
Romel is an 18 year old young man who wants excel in life.  He lives at home with his mother Yolanda, 42, who he supports the best he can.  Romel is excited to get out and succeed in life.  He works in construction where his main task is to help his fellow workers load the things they need such as iron, dirt, etc.  He has been working this job for a month. Since he is the eldest son, he has been helping his mother with the household expenses since his father died.  In time he wants to open a store for his mother so that she can have a way to support herself and have peace of mind while Romel works in construction.  

This will be his first loan with MFP and he is very happy to know that he will have financial support as this will give him security advancing in his job.  He is also grateful to his communal bank for giving him the opportunity to work with them.  With the 1,500 nuevos soles [Peruvian currency], he will buy products such as rice, sugar, canned goods, sweets, beverages, etc., so he can open the store for his mother.

loans.use: purchase rice, sugar, canned goods, sweets, beverages, etc

loans.name: Gabriel Antonio

texts.es:
Don Gabriel,  reside  en Catarina municipio del departamento de Masaya. Es casado y  posee su negocio de compra y venta de artesanía de barro, desde hace 6 años, este se lo heredó su mama y ha continuado con el negocio.

Actualmente está teniendo mucha demanda por la temporada navideña, sus puntos de ventas las tiene en Diriamba, San Marcos, Las Esquinas de Catarina, San Juan de Oriente.  

El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de jarrones grandes, cuadros de pared, juegos de botellas de barro, hamacas de manila, jarrones de 3 piezas, entre otros.
texts.en: Gabriel resides in Catarina in the department of Masaya. He is married and has had a business buying and selling clay crafts for the past six years. He inherited the business from his mother, who continues with the business. Currently he is experiencing very high demand because of the Christmas season at his sales posts in Diriamba, San Marcos, street corners in Catarina and San Juan de Oriente. He is requesting the loan to purchase large vases, wall paintings, clay bottle games, manilla hammocks, three-piece vase sets, and other items.

loans.use: to purchase large vases, wall paintings, clay bottle games, manilla hammocks, three-piece vase sets, etc.

loans.name: Rosmeri

texts.es: Rosmeri, de 39 años es madre soltera; vive en su propia casa junto a su pequeña hija Naydelin de 09 años a quien desea un mejor futuro. Rosmeri es una señora emprendedora que se dedica a labrar su tierra hace 06 años para poder darle una buena comodidad y educación a su única hija. En sus tierras tiene plantaciones de piña y coca; en tiempos de cosecha y desmonte de maleza lo realiza con ayuda de jornaleros. Considera que la piña es de su agrado; porque es más rentable, y más durante octubre y noviembre, ya que son los meses donde producen buenos frutos. Piensa incrementar más plantaciones de piña y para lo cual necesita capital para comprar maás plantas de piña. Este será su préstamo número 06 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para que pueda cumplir con su objetivo. Asimismo agradece a su banco comunal por dejarle trabajar con personas que la apoyan. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar plantas de piña para incrementar sus cultivos.
texts.en: Rosmeri, 39 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her little girl, Naydelin, 9 years old, for whom she wants a better life. Rosmeri is an entrepreneurial woman who has worked her land for 6 years in order to be able to give her only daughter a comfortable life and a good education. She grows pineapple and coconut on her land; she has help from day laborers during harvest time and for weeding. She likes pineapple because it is more profitable and produces more during October and November, which are the months when good fruit is produced. She wants to increase her pineapple crops and for this she needs capital to purchase more pineapple plants. This will be her sixth loan with MFP, therefore she hopes for your collaboration so that she can meet her goal. She also thanks her communal bank for letting her work with people who support her. With the 2,000 nuevos soles, she will be able to purchase pineapple plants to increase her crops.

loans.use: to purchase pineapple plants

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es: Saturnina de 40 años, es una mujer soltera, vive en casa alquilada junto a sus 04 hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Saturnina, desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra; y creció con la cualidades de poder trabajar en el campo. Ahora sus terrenos de cultivo ha sembrado hojas de coca y cacao, plantas originarias de la zona selvática. Tiene 15 años trabajando en esta actividad, y en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros para la extracción de los frutos y así avanzar con mayor rapidez. Lo que más le gusta de trabajo es recolectar los frutos de la plantas; ya que siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan buenos frutos como recompensa y considera que lo mas difícil es transportar sus frutos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio de su ciudad. Ahora lo que más desea es poder comprar otras plantas para poder sembrar en sus tierras como: maní y ajonjolí, pues le resultaría rentable para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos. Este será  su préstamo número 01 con MFP, por tanto espera del apoyo financiero para cumplir con sus objetivos. En su banco comunal esta contenta por trabajar con personas responsables. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles; podrá comprar plantas de maní y ajonjolí y así incrementar en productividad.
texts.en:
Saturnina, 40, is a single woman who lives in a rented house along with her 4 children to whom she offers a better quality of life.  From the time Saturnina was very young, her parents taught her how to work in the fields and she grew up with the qualities that she would need to farm.  Now she has planted her fields with coca and cacao plants that originate in the jungle area.  She has been doing this work for 15 years and during harvest time she hires farm workers to pick the fruit and thus move faster.
What she likes most about her work is picking the fruit because she sees the result of months of hard labor.  She gets good quality fruit as a reward and considers the most difficult part of the work  transporting it from the farm to the collection centers for small farmers in the city.   Now what she most wants is to be able to buy other plants that she can put in the fields such as: peanuts and sesame.  They would give her a good income and help improve the quality of life for herself and her children.
This will be her first loan with MFP and she is hoping that the financing will help her achieve her goals.  She is happy with the communal bank because she is with responsible people.  She will use the 3000 new sols to buy peanut and sesame plants and so increase her productivity.

loans.use: tp buy peanut and sesame plants

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, de 42 años una mujer viuda; vive en casa propia junto a sus 02 hijos Romel y Brayan, a quienes brinda lo mejor para un buen futuro. Yolanda, es una mujer muy trabajadora; con el arduo trabajo de cada dia trata de sobresalir ante las adversidades del destino. Yolanda tiene una bodega y es la primera en abrirse, desde las 06 de la mañana ya esta atendiendo a sus clientes sabiendo de la variedad de mercadería que hay en su bodega no dudan en comprarle, Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes sobre las experiencias que tienen o las cosas que pasan por su ámbito circular, lleva 02 años en este negocio y considera que lo mas difícil es permanecer de pie durante todo el día. Con el crédito solicitado comprara mas víveres para su negocio y así abastecerse de mercadería. Este es su préstamo numero 07 con MFP, y le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá comprando mercadería para su tienda como: Conservas, bebidas, detergentes, arroz, azúcar, etc.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 42, is a widow.  She lives in her own home with her two children, Romel and Brayan, whom she offers the best for a good future.  Yolanda is a very hardworking woman.  With each day's hard work she tries to stand out against the adversities of fate.

Yolanda has a grocery store and is the first one to open.  From 6 in the morning she is already waiting on her customers.  Knowing the variety of merchandise in her store, they do not hesitate to buy from her.

What she likes most about her work is talking with her customers about their experiences or the things that happen around them.  She has been in this business for two years and she considers the most difficult thing to be standing up for the entire day.

With the requested loan she will buy more supplies for her business and so stock up on merchandise.  This is her seventh loan with MFP, and it pleases her to be part of her communal bank because of working with responsible and supportive people.

With the 1,000 PEN she will invest in buying merchandise for her store, such as canned goods, drinks, detergent, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, drinks, detergent, rice, and sugar.

loans.name: Norma Leticia

texts.es:
Norma tiene 36 años de edad y vive con sus hijos en el municipio de Macuelizo. Ella es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años de edad. 

Va a invertir este crédito en la compra de accesorios de plata como ser: aritos, pulseras, anillos y cadenas. Tiene 8 años de vender y le dedica 4 horas diarias vendiendo en las maquilas donde trabajan sus clientes. 

Norma espera ofrecer más productos a su clientela y cumplir los pedidos que tiene que entregar. Su sueño es aumentar su inventario para vender y obtener ganancias que cubran los gastos de estudio de universidad de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Norma is 36 years old and lives with her children in the Macuelizo municipality.  She is a single mother of two children, aged 10 and 8.

She is going to invest this loan in the purchase of silver accessories, such as earrings, bracelets, rings and chains.  She has eight years of selling silver, and works four hours daily selling at the factories where her customers work.

Norma hopes to be able to offer more products for sale to her customers, and to be able to fill the orders that she has.  Her dream is to increase her inventory for sale and to earn profits which will cover the costs of university education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase silver accessories such as earrings, bracelets, rings, and chains.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es: Zenaida, es madre soltera de 36 años; vive en su propia casa junto a su único hijo Diner, de 11 años, a quien da lo mejor para que tenga un buen futuro. Zenaida, es una mujer trabajadora y todo por darle lo mejor a su hijo. Zenaida es una mujer que se desenvuelve en el ámbito del negocio por sobresalir en la vida, se dedica a la venta de frutas, trae de las chacras para poder venderlas en  las ferias del día sábado y domingo en ciudad de san Francisco; viene trabajando hace 10 años en este negocio. La venta de frutas le proporciona buenas ganancias; su plan a futuro es comprar más frutas para seguir vendiendo a sus clientes que ya la conocen por las ricas frutas que ofrece. Este será su préstamo número 01 con MFP, está muy contenta el saber que contará con el apoyo financiero que le brindan. Agradece a su banco comunal por darle la oportunidad de trabajar con ellos. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar frutas como: pacay, piña, naranja, entre otros. Para seguir vendiendo a sus principales clientes.
texts.en:
